metadata.name: CURVES 6
metadata.description:
CURVES artworks break the symmetry and show that even imperfection can be beautiful. Random water movements create unique and unexpected face and body details.

2019 2nd place winner FineArt Photography Awards, category Abstract. Photographs awarded 500px Editors Choice and Best of Photovogue.

1080x1080px
